description:
This course aims to help participants to understand the most important aspects of Educational Technology, for this general aspects of it are treated to various specific aspects about using ICT (information and communications technology) in education .
As described above to be taken as a starting point a pedagogical approach from which we analyze ICT as useful tools in different contexts and always from the previous analysis of strategies and methodologies.
Educational applications of various tools and their use will be addressed in two ways: in the classroom in person or -of semipresencial- and telenseñanza environments (e-learning). This course will finish addressing the issue of citizenship and civic participation, since they are of great relevance today.
It is structured in 6 modules, corresponding each with an estimated student work a maximum of 3 hours and a total duration of six weeks time.
title: Educación en un mundo conectado (Education in a connected world)
